item.title: Snoopy with a Red Hat
item.description: Audio by Jesse It’s 4pm on a beautiful Sunday in the idyllic New Zealand countryside, just outside of Auckland.

item.title: The Cookie Shop
item.description: Audio by Jesse Amongst a huge and expansive busy metropolitan city, in a quiet little lane, tucked away behind large skyscrapers, is a tiny little cookie shop.

item.title: Thunder Penguin – Part 2
item.description: Audio by Jesse “Okay, Thunder, we’ve given you everything we’ve got,” said one of the puffer fish.

item.title: Thunder the Penguin – Part 1
item.description: Audio by Jesse A quick little penguin speeds through the water.

item.title: The Pancake Star
item.description: Audio by Jesse Inside of a famous Japanese restaurant in the heart of Tokyo city is a delicious smell of honey.

item.title: A Change of Heart
item.description: Audio by Jesse A colourful and shiny metal cube sits silently on top of a desk at an accounting firm.

item.title: The Ice Slide
item.description: Audio by Jesse Harsh blizzard winds are forcing their way across a freezing desert.

item.title: The Bouncing Bird Delivers Thunder to His Mom
item.description: Audio by Jesse It was a stormy and dark night when baby Brent was playing with some toy birds.

item.title: The Box’s Secret
item.description: Audio by Jesse New York city is a busy and dense modern city.

item.title: The Giant Red Panda
item.description: Audio by Jesse It is 9pm on a Monday on a very hot August night.
